expertise.content: Full-stack developer skilled in React, Angular, .NET Core, and MSSQL. Builds scalable, high-performance apps with seamless API and database integration.
Expert in ReactJS & Angular, crafting responsive UIs with focus on UX, performance & accessibility. Skilled in modular design & Redux state management.
Expert in building scalable, secure GraphQL & REST APIs with clear schemas, robust error handling, and smooth front-end integration for top performance.
Experienced in MS SQL Server: schema design, stored procedures, indexing, and query optimization. Ensures data integrity, performance, and scalable solutions.
